articles.title: Amid GOP support, Senate Democrats see hope for same-sex marriage vote
articles.description: The move to protect same-sex marriage offers an early window into how Democrats plan to solidify individual rights in the aftermath of the Supreme Court decision to overturn Roe v. Wade.
articles.content:

articles.title: Prosecutors Rest in Contempt Case Against Steve Bannon
articles.description: The government, seeking to hold Mr. Bannon to account for defying a subpoena from Congress, wrapped up its case after calling just two witnesses.

articles.title: 1 soldier dead, 9 injured after lightning strike at Army base in Georgia
